Posts.EditableText: I'm playing a game and it keeps getting stuck. I can't do anything or move anymore. I'm using the browser version and I would of downloaded it except I'm on a mac. How can I stop this from happening? I've tried switching wifis, turning wifi off, opening VPNs, nothing works.
Posts.HTML: I'm playing a game and it keeps getting stuck. I can't do anything or move anymore. I'm using the browser version and I would of downloaded it except I'm on a mac. How can I stop this from happening? I've tried switching wifis, turning wifi off, opening VPNs, nothing works.

Posts.EditableText: Did it start working for you, or is it still getting stuck?
